casebody.data:
OCEAN HILL
v.
CURRITUCK BOARD OF COMM. No. 382PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 2, 2007. Jonathan C. Krisko, Charlotte, Thomas P. Nash, IV, Elizabeth City, for Ocean Hill I Prop. Owners Asso. C. Everett Thompson, II, Elizabeth City, for Ocean Hill Joint Venture et al. Katherine F. McKenzie, Raleigh, for Currituck County Bd. of Comm. Paul A. Meyer, Assistant General Counsel, James B. Blackburn, III, Matthew W. Sawchak, Julia F. Youngman, Raleigh, for NC Asso. of County Commissioners. Andrew L. Romanet, Jr., General Counsel, Gregory F. Schwitzgebel, III, Senior Assistant General Counsel, for NC League of Municipalities. Robert E. Hagemann, Senior Assistant City Attorney, Ashley R. Heaton, Assistant City Attorney, for City of Charlotte.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of December 2006 by Respondents for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of January 2007."
